website_summaries.verdict: Especially if you’re hosting a get together, this 48-pack of stemless champagne flutes are an impressive and functional modern touch.
pros: Convenient to “grab and go” from the box as these stemless flutes don’t require assembly
These have a sleek look that closely resembles real glass without the worry of shattering
These are sturdy yet light,  making them comfortable to use and carry

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: These glasses could've gotten a 5 if it weren't for one dealbreaker - the rims aren't lined (or whatever it's called to give it a smooth finish). So the edges are sharp, clearly not enough to cut you - but you're definitely going to feel it especially in the corners of your mouth. Never thought I'd ever say something is uncomfortable to drink from, but here we are. My friend bought these same type of glasses but a different brand (Tossware, I believe) and they were great, rimmed & all! I didn't experience the melted/defective glasses I see from other Reviewers - so that's good, but otherwise, I wouldn't purchase these again. Pretty though.
customer_reviews.author: kareen.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment upon Delivery
customer_reviews.text: We were very upset when opening the box at the bridal shower and nearly half of the glasses were deformed and warped, rendering them unusable. Would not order this product, nor from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber K

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASH PRIOR TO USE. TRULY DISPOSABLE?
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a wedding shower. Decided to rinse them ONLY in the top rack of the dishwasher -HUGE MISTAKE. Took them out before the cycle had ended. The bottoms of the glasses were bowed out and could not stand up. I hoping I could salvage half of them for the shower. TWO. TWO were usable. Packed them back in the boxed and tossed them in the trash. I had transported them 120 miles to the location of the shower. I was so disappointed. But, in the moment, trashed them and went with Plan B. Used punch cups for the mimosa bar. Embarrassed.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Ursery White

customer_reviews.title: Love these flutes
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased these for an upcoming wedding. Received them on time and they are as pictured. They look like real glass, but I just love that they have a more modern sleek look. I drank wine out of one to test. Just a really lovely glass - can’t wait to use these. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: phido

customer_reviews.title: Just one little thing
customer_reviews.text: I really really wanted to love these. BUT more than half the glasses rocked. Yes rocked. I would assume this is a random production issue. Not sure if I would but again but the ones that had a flat bottom were a hit. See photo.
customer_reviews.author: S. L.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wedding and they’re amazing!! Exactly what I wanted and there’s no assembly required like the flutes with twist on stems!! They’re super cute and saved me hours of time :)
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for single use
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a single use, disposable toasting glass for our daughter's wedding, but we didn't want it to be cheap looking. These fit the bill nicely. Elegant looking, they seem study enough for the intended use. We are pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K.E.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great, classy, easy to clean and look expensive without having glass. Highly recommend. Received many compliments at the party I hosted and asked where I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Nuth

customer_reviews.title: Delighted and many compliments
customer_reviews.text: The stemless flutes are outstanding. They look fine and held up well. Plus, they hold a decent pour— not just a toasting taste. Many people complimented them. Caveat— for a party at which people are standing and mingling, it is easier to hold a plate and stemmed “glass” in one hand. But for our reception they worked very well and we intend to wash and reuse them another time.
customer_reviews.author: Happiness on Lake

customer_reviews.title: Rims are sharp/uneven.
customer_reviews.text: Similar to others reviews my cups same with the rims cut funky & not smooth. This caused them to be sharp and they were also cut unevenly. They are however sturdy and otherwise nice but I returned them and purchased a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Anela A

customer_reviews.title: Good for large parties
customer_reviews.text: The plastic isn't as crisp as the photos. You can see a little warping in the plastic, but they are much nicer looking than the disposable champagne flutes where the stem pops off.
customer_reviews.author: debee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, clear plastic flutes!
customer_reviews.text: Used these flutes for mimosas at a retirement brunch. They are crystal clear plastic and very sturdy---not flimsy, soft plastic at all. Could easily be reused many times with hand washing. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Could be better but saved us from a wedding disaster!
customer_reviews.text: These were a wedding saver! Ordered the flutes w stems first and on a last minute whim decided to see if they held liquid... THEY DID NOT! 50 out of 50 leaked so I did not bother testing the other 200! Replaced them w these and had no problems. The edge of the flute (where your lips touch ) is a little rough on some but not a deal breaker. Received quickly and in good order!
customer_reviews.author: kristy lyon

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's wedding venue did not allow glass and I hate the wine glasses that you screw on the bottom. These looked like real glass at a distance and were very sturdy. The rim was not sharp at all either. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Crissy Jeckel

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The pictures don’t do any justice. These are super cheap looking. The edges of the cups are often sharp and jagged. Just asking for someone to hurt themselves on these. I get that they’re more reasonably priced, but the pictures don’t look like the actual product in terms of quality. Steer clear of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Good quality great for toasting glass
customer_reviews.text: This type of glass I didn't need to worry about them leaking like the ones you need to attach the stem onto. Good quality but top opening is small so seemed hard to drink out of but perfect if only using them as a toasting glass. I purchased these with the intention of disposing them so I didn't try washing them but feel it would be difficult with the opening being small
customer_reviews.author: Deanna (Dee) Oldakowski

customer_reviews.title: Elegant plastic
customer_reviews.text: These champagne flutes are very durable and sturdy. Used them for a mimosa bar and had no problems, they never fell over when filled.
customer_reviews.author: Micah C.

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Flutes!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shape and ease in using these stemless flutes! They're very lightweight, but perfect once the beverage is added. Theyre modern and affordable. I will be using them for future events!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good reusable champagne flute
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a more sustainable option to throw away plastic cups. I have washed and reused and they have held up well so far. They look nice, especially in photos. The mouth part seems like it would be too sharp to enjoy, but after using I really didn't notice that being a problem, nor did anyone complain. They are very light, which makes transporting a tray of empty ones nearly impossible without having them all fall over. Not a deal breaker for me but worth considering depending on what your needs are.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: good size, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Now I have not actually used these yet... But based on checking out a few, they are a really nice size and seem sturdy and nice. Soooo much better than popping together the silly tiny junk ones. But actually on that note... may be a larger capacity than necessary for a toast.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for a baby shower I hosted. They look real and were able to be thrown away after the party to avoid clean up. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for "Mom-Osas"
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered these flutes for a baby shower. Convenient, attractive and sturdy they made our 'Mom-Osas' an elegant treat. Dress them up with strawberries, raspberries or your choice of fruit. We also do catering and will purchase for parties.
customer_reviews.author: gypsy rose

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for our Hawaiian themed mimosa bar and they were amazing! None of them were broken when we received them and everyone complimented on how they truly looked like real glass champagne flutes! Best part was I didn’t have to worry about anyone dropping them and them breaking on my floor. Highly recommend for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: LaurMAnders

customer_reviews.title: Stemless champagne glasses
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed, individually wrapped in plastic sleeves, a couple had scratches, but a good deal for quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Party?  These are a big help
customer_reviews.text: Hosted a mimosa tasting. These were a great help for people to taste multiple drinks and not worry about having clean glasses.
customer_reviews.author: theresa

customer_reviews.title: Nice cupss!!!
customer_reviews.text: Way better than the ones with stems because they keep falling off. These are nice and quality feels so good. Use them for regular mixed drinks too and just looks so classy
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for showers and parties
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a get together that had self serve mimosas. Perfect size and worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Everyone complimented during my bridal shower! Looked very real.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy Huizar

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected 4 the price
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are light weight but once we add ice and champagne I'm sure they'll be great !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: light but right
customer_reviews.text: these were great and well recieved at a very snazzy baby shower strongly recommended for mimosa bars!
customer_reviews.author: awin or aloss

customer_reviews.title: Good for party
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a shower, they held up great. Just a little hard to balance when empty but they worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Thin
customer_reviews.text: Much flimsier than I thought they would be. They definitely bend while holding it since the plastic is thin.
customer_reviews.author: M and R

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Used for a bridal shower: Mrs & Mimosas and they were excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then expected
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then expected... I'm still going through all the glasses to make sure they are good for the event I will update if anything is off
customer_reviews.author: Viper32

customer_reviews.title: Rough edges
customer_reviews.text: Edges were not finished, were rather rough. I had to switch to glass flutes. I was very unhappy with this shipment. I have used these flutes before, that is why I ordered them, not again.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie B

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: We have used these for parties for some time. Perfect for any sparkling beverage. Elegant for a disposable.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I live in a Lifecare Community and we have an annual New Year's for 150 to 200 people. The Champagne needs to be poured quickly and the people who open and pour the Champagne are in their late 80's and 90's. I have tried other glasses and there has been constant spillage. These worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Stained, Scratched and Uneven Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Received order in a timley fashion but many items were damaged. Out of 48 flutes over half were stained, scratched or uneven. Very disappointed. Thankfully I ordered in advance before the event being purchased for. In addition, I purchased a new product. There is no way these items were brand new. Value was good for price but not the quality.
customer_reviews.author: NedLax

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t look like the photo
customer_reviews.text: They look much cheaper in person. Mine arrived all scratched up. I had to cover them in glitter
customer_reviews.author: Monet Warren

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Used it for my baby shower and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Adeyemi Planche

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't believe the day of my event I opened the box of Champagne flutes to wash them. 8 of the 48 in one box were all melted. The couldn't sit on a surface and the rim was all melted down. Had to run out to find replacement glasses. Created a lot of stress!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wedding shower mimosas
customer_reviews.text: Perfect...at first I bought the stemmed glasses but they were much to small, and even though I had to spend extra for next day delivery, it was so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Plastic disposable champagne flutes
customer_reviews.text: These champagne flutes are prefect for gatherings because they are disposable. They are very sturdy and I prefer them with out the stem much better! Also you can hand wash if you would like to reuse again.
customer_reviews.author: SARA

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear and durable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived when expected. Durable and just as described. Clear plastic, flawless. I previously purchased stemless wine glasses and these champagne flutes are just as lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Thibeault

customer_reviews.title: Made party fun
customer_reviews.text: Great for a party. Everyone loved them. Only 1 out of 48 leaned a little. Too much champagne? 😃 Was able to wash and now I can reuse them. Good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Freda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for celebrating
customer_reviews.text: Used for bridal shower and wedding. great size. Packaged so they wouldn't scratch. Definitely using for next event!
customer_reviews.author: Lorene Jager

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and perfect size for mimosas. Good for baby showers where kids can also use them without worrying about broken glass.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a wedding
customer_reviews.text: I have sent back two other kinds before I found this one. I am so excited to use these at my wedding. They are sturdy and weren’t broken when they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: K Neve

customer_reviews.title: Can reuse
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. I’ve used for two baby showers. You can totally wash and reuse
customer_reviews.author: Jake H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Price & Classy Look
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a nicer plastic champagne flute for my sisters Baby Shower and they were PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica T.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for events
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for events when you don’t want to deal with dishes or running out of glasses. We were nervous about sturdiness but we used them at my bridal shops runway show and they held up wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is horrible. The champagne flutes were very flimsy, had sharp edges, and the plastic was warped. I had to go out and purchase something else on the day of my party. Don't waste your money with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved These!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint was that they're a little tippy until you fill them up.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Fairly sturdy for plastic cups and crystal clear
customer_reviews.author: Palm Trees

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Loved them! They are Perfect for outdoors and can be washed or thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic for not a cheap price
customer_reviews.text: I was thoroughly disappointed when I opened the box to find extremely cheap looking pieces of plastic. The plastic had imperfections all throughout the cup and they had seams on both sides that made it look like 2 pieces of plastic put together to form the shape. I am returning these immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: Love these stemless plastic glass. They were well packed and non the of cups were damaged. It has a very classy look, perfect for special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Mox

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you would think
customer_reviews.text: These were used at my wedding for champagne toasts. They were much smaller than I'd imagined. They totally served their purpose though. It was much better not having to put glasses together and having the bottoms possibly fall of.
customer_reviews.author: maggie page

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful item that was received quickly. I ordered stickers from a local printer of our non profit; I placed them on the glasses. Many people were impressed with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: LOVED
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my mimosa bar and they were perfect. All of my guest enjoyed their bottomless mimosas feeling fancy! The plastic was strong. The rims were a tad rough to me so I ordered straws for everyone to use. Definitely would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for baby showers and large parties
customer_reviews.text: Used these for my baby shower and they were perfect! Above and beyond what I was expecting, perfect for a mimosa bar.
customer_reviews.author: tw1234

customer_reviews.title: Scratches all over each one
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed for the price. Every single glass has scratches on it and looks like they been used or mishandled. Not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Plastic Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Need to order more They are good enough for parties Easy clean up - Toss them Stable and they don’t break!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I've been looking for. I wanted something nicer than a paper cup, with no stem (too tippy) and unbreakable.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Edges are SHARP and raw, I wouldn't ask anyone to put this near their mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for social gatherings
customer_reviews.text: Used these for my momosa bar at baby shower and they were perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Nice! Looked beautiful and worked perfect for my outdoor mimosa bar!
customer_reviews.author: SJW

customer_reviews.title: Stemless
customer_reviews.text: They let look good and no stem make a better center of gravity
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a party
customer_reviews.text: These were great for a one time use, 90th birthday celebration. We served virgin mojitos and watermelon water. Very classy and elevated the party from traditional plastic cups. Nice hand feel , not tippy. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: Used these for my sister’s bridal shower and they worked perfect for the mimosa bar. Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Great size and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Used for baby shower...tip edge not sharp like some plastic glasses...clear plastic looks like glass
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our mimosas at my daughters baby shower! I knew I didn’t want the ones with stems as those usually fall apart, these were great! I even hand washed some to save to use over the upcoming holidays!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent champagne flutes for backyard party
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid that plastic flutes would not be as “classy” as glass ones, but these were perfect for our large party. Very stable, easy to fill and hold.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E. Hermansen

customer_reviews.title: These were elegant and disposable.
customer_reviews.text: We used these stemless champagne glasses for my daughter’s outdoor wedding shower. These looked very elegant filled with the sparkling rose!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and perfect size for a mimosa!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved these champagne flutes for the mimosa bar at my future daughter-in-law's bridal shower.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Very classy
customer_reviews.text: Such elegant glasses. Not flimsy and look much like real glass.
customer_reviews.author: Ebean

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and delivery service
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered twice from this company and delivery has been on point, the product is great and can be reused.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Edges way to sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected, the edges are way to sharp. Will return the package.
customer_reviews.author: rosemarie gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful on the tables for a wedding
customer_reviews.text: These look very elegant and real. Everyone was surprised they were plastic. It was perfect for our occasion. And they are easily washable and reusable if you want!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Cheers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our open house. Durable enough to wash and reuse
customer_reviews.author: stacey vargas

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Most people thought they were reusable at first sight! Look nice in pics!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Ackley

customer_reviews.title: Great for Disposables
customer_reviews.text: Bought theses for a party more than once now and they work out perfect every time! Thick plastic and sturdy perfect for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Fancy cups
customer_reviews.text: These cups where amazing super cute and looked fancy. Definitely reusable!
customer_reviews.author: gigi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Prosecco
customer_reviews.text: Wow these were so elegant and perfect for Prosecco at a wedding
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa B.

customer_reviews.title: Great stemless champagne flutes
customer_reviews.text: Great size and will be a great addition to our Bridal brunch
customer_reviews.author: Mona Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Some of the edges of the glass were melted and disfigured.
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a bridal shower. Overall, it was a good purchase for the price, but there were quite a few that were disfigured and melted looking. We had enough normal ones to suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Hand wash and reuse!
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t have any issue with any damaged on arrival. These are sturdy and could definitely be hand washed to use many times!
customer_reviews.author: XTR

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for one time use, was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great for an outdoor party. Put in the dishwasher to see if they would last, some came out warped but not a big deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: What I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be exactly what I was looking for! Bought them for a bridal shower, haven't used yet, but it looks like they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I used these for an event I was hosting and they were perfect! Elegant and sturdy. Will buy again. 4 stars because about five of them were dirty/stained with a brown liquid on the bottoms?
customer_reviews.author: QA

customer_reviews.title: Great for a wedding toast!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our outdoor wedding venue! Really pretty, great size and no problems with tipping or cracking!
customer_reviews.author: Keith M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Wine “glasses” for price!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price!! Was able to reuse a few times because of its durability!
customer_reviews.author: MissMe

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor hit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for an outdoor party. Much easier to store than stemmed glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bubbly holders
customer_reviews.text: The tumblers were used on the mimosa bar that I created for my daughter’s bridal shower. They were a practical, stylish and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Cornwell

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The lip of the glass is quite harsh for drinking. Had higher hopes!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Cheers
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for a brunch wedding! Good quality and look like real glass
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Bush

customer_reviews.title: Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: Used these for my daughter's wedding shower and they were perfect. Going to use them for the wedding also.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Great Inexpensive Partyware
customer_reviews.text: I used these flutes for a mimosa bar at a baby shower. They have a modern style which I was looking for and looked good on the tables. Some flutes arrived with scratch marks on them even though they were individually wrapped. If you are throwing a party you may want to order extra to make up for the ones with scratch marks.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a party!
customer_reviews.text: Used for several holiday parties and they were exactly what I was looking for. My only small complaint is that they came in a huge box that is a pain to store since I didn’t use all of them this season. They are each individually wrapped which was a very nice touch and made me very comfortable to put them out for my guests to use.
customer_reviews.author: Azhiker

product_meta.title: 48 Pack Stemless Plastic Champagne Flutes Disposable 9 Oz Clear Plastic Toasting Glasses Shatterproof Recyclable and BPA-Free
product_meta.description:
Add Elegant to your party with the MUNFIX PLASTIC STEMLESS CHAMPAGNE GLASSES 

The MUNFIX fancy toast champagne flute is perfect for catered events, parties, bars, nightclubs or any other event where you require an economical alternative to permanent glassware. This disposable cocktail glasses are made of durable clear hard plastic. 

The Munfix Clear Plastic Flute are Elegant and practical, Premium Plastic Disposable Cups a must-have for the frequent party hostess! use it for wine cups, champagne cups, mimosa cups, or water cup. ideal for bridal shower, bachelorette engagement parties, weddings, sophisticated events and New Year's Eve parties. 

 PLEASE NOTE:The Munfix Stemless Flutes are not dishwasher safe
feature_bullets: Add elegant to your party with the Munfix Stemless Clear Plastic Champagne Glass Flute
Ideal for catered events, parties, bars, nightclubs or any other event
Perfect for Mimosas, Bloody Mary's, Wine Glasses, Sodas, Cocktail Cups, Parfaits, Sundaes and Other Desserts
9oz Shatterproof Wedding champagne flutes Made of durable premium hard recyclable plastic, BPA-Free, Not dishwasher safe!.
Bulk Pack of 48 disposable champagne flutes plastic stemware save you time and energy
